info.description:
Introduction
============


This product provides an adapter for collective.plonetruegallery to display
contentleadimages from collective.contentleadimage.

In the weird case where an object is an image (provides IImageContent) and
also has a contentleadimage, the contentleadimage is the one displayed in the
gallery.


Installation
============

Just add this product to buildout's eggs, or install it in python path. Does
not require any installation in Plone.

Changelog
=========

1.0 (2012/08/14)
----------------

- Initial release

info.html_description:
Introduction

This product provides an adapter for collective.plonetruegallery to display contentleadimages from collective.contentleadimage.

In the weird case where an object is an image (provides IImageContent) and also has a contentleadimage, the contentleadimage is the one displayed in the gallery.

Installation

Just add this product to buildout’s eggs, or install it in python path. Does not require any installation in Plone.

Changelog

1.0 (2012/08/14)

  • Initial release
